value.fullName: Yes, I pray daily, attend worship services weekly, and prefer a roommate with similar devout practices.
value.label: Yes, I pray daily, attend worship services weekly, and prefer a roommate with similar devout practices.

value.fullName: No, I do not have a faith and prefer not to live with a person who actively practices a religion.
value.label: No, I do not have a faith and prefer not to live with a person who actively practices a religion.

value.fullName: No preference, I am flexible about belief systems---to each their own.
value.label: No preference, I am flexible about belief systems---to each their own.
